Bob Haden

Website: Haden Foundation

Reverend Bob Haden was a Jungian Psychotherapist, Episcopal Priest, Pastoral Counselor and founded The Haden Institute in Charlotte, NC in 1994. He is the author of Unanswered Letters From God: Using Biblical Dreams to Unlock Your Nightly Dreams and is co-author of Soul's Labyrinth. He taught dreamwork for over 30 years. He passed away on April 17, 2023.
